content: ORFEUS NETWORK‚úàÔ∏è NO COMMISSION - YES PROTECTION TRAVEL ‚úàÔ∏è| ¬†WEBSITE ¬†| ¬†WHITEPAPER ¬†| ¬†FACEBOOK | ¬†TWITTER ¬†| ¬†REDDIT ¬†| ¬†TELEGRAM ¬†| ¬†VIDEO ¬†|_______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________ORFEUS NETWORK is a Blockchain-based travel ecosystem consisting of platforms and services that promote commission-free and secure traveling. Basically, our products including TripXv and ClubXchain will allow you to plan trips and book tickets without any commission involved.In short,Orfeus Network = Travel - CommissionOrfeus Network is a decentralized self-developing tourist marketplace. The ecosystem comprises many advanced products, all created with the aim to make traveling a secure and cost-effective experience for everyone.All platforms in the Orfeus Network follow the principle of 0% commission, that is, users will never have to pay any commission for their travel bookings made via Orfeus Network or its platforms._______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________Platforms in the Orfeus Network:1) TripXv.com - for self-organization and sharing2) ClubXchain.com - for attracting the middle class in Europe with one flight3) Finetika.eu - for financial support of tourists._______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________The ORFEUS token has 4 main functions:Users can pay for products and services on all our platforms.Means for receiving bonuses, discounts and other bonuses.Right to vote when discussing proposals and making decisions for the development of the ORFEUS Network.Crypto token trading on the open market. Crypto token trading on the open market._______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________An important part of the project is targeted and refers to "protected" tourism without commissions in Europe and the world.The main characteristics of the ‚ÄòProtected‚Äô & ‚Äòvirus-free zones‚Äô are:https://i.imgur.com/bzJJCOP.png_______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________THE EIGHT PILLARS OF THE ORFEUS TOKEN NETWORKhttps://i.imgur.com/XClZyhy.png_______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________TOKEN DETAILSContract address: 0x3AAc99Df6A4B22C34e1B7eF7aa513C7276f3803Bhttps://i.imgur.com/gs6AvVa.png_______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________TOKEN DISTRIBUTIONhttps://i.imgur.com/VRqxFr5.png_______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________ICO Sale Schedulehttps://i.imgur.com/6faqKC0.jpg_______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________ROADMAPhttps://i.imgur.com/qm3aVg9.png_______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________AIRDROP AND BOUNTYInformation regarding airdrop and bounty will be added soon._______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________| ¬†WEBSITE ¬†| ¬†WHITEPAPER ¬†| ¬†FACEBOOK | ¬†TWITTER ¬†| ¬†REDDIT ¬†| ¬†TELEGRAM ¬†| ¬†VIDEO ¬†|

comments.body: Orfeus Network Airdrop Program Is Now Live! Claim Your 1000 ORF (0.1 BNB) Nowhttps://i.imgur.com/GhngZYG.jpgSuper excited to announce the launch of our official AIRDROP, which starts today and will conclude on 31st July, right before our pre-sale starts (1st August). We‚Äôll give 1000 ORF tokens to each successful participant of the airdrop. Participate to win 1000 ORF tokens by completing a few very simple tasks.
